description: Generates a new, generic end-to-end test definition for the given or default project.
title: Angular e2e Application Options Schema

___name.description: The name of the new e2e app.

___relatedAppName.description: The name of the app being tested.

___rootSelector.description: The HTML selector for the root component of the test app.

___projectRoot.description: The root folder for the new test app.
